entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Westlock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
